page.title: 15 Entertainment In Gt Haseley
page.content: On Tuesdays we have a Junior Youth Club in the Village Hall.It meets from 7.30-8.30 and it costs 30p entry fee and includes drink and crisps. Once a year we have a fete or street fair with lots of stalls and games.We usually have a fancy dress parade and other entertainment. In August we hold a Horticulteral Show when all the best produce is on show.This year it was held in the grounds of the Old Rectory.There was also a display of vintage cars,some over 50 years old. Each weekend in Summer the Cricket Club have matches at the playiny field. At present there is no Football Club but the School hve football matches in winter.Bingo is very popular with the older folk and takes place every other week in the Village Hall. by Stephen Stratford.
